### Closing the Epic
**Inputs:**
  - [ ] Review original source materials to verify that the epic, requirements and user needs are in sync
  - [ ] Review Epic and the corresponding Jira feature/improvement to ensure they are in sync on requirements and user needs


**Outputs:**
  - [ ] Review that the requirements and user needs are represented in the stories and work completed.
  - [ ] Review that the work completed is properly represented in the design and architecture document.
  - [ ] Review that the new work is properly represented in the user documentation.


**Verification:**
  - [ ] Review that the test protocols adequately test the requirements.


**Validation:**
  - [ ] validate that the features properly meet the user need.
